text: Ni$ jehlen wid innan: "Öebbi, s tidep, d lmasiê, mmi s n Meryem". Ini: "anwa isâan kra n lkwelf, s$uô Öebbi, ma ihwa yaS ad Ine$ lmasiê, mmi s n Meryem, imma s, akked wayen akw illan di tmurt"? N Öebbi tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan. Öebbi Izmer i yal cci
